file_content.text: Go! Just get out of here!
This is your fault! You did this to us!
We're not your enemy.
Everyone calm down.
We just risked our lives to get you away from those Skytroopers!
I saved you!
They've got every reason to be mad.
Don't raise your hand to me again.
Big mistake.
Don't make it worse.
The Skytroopers were probably searching for us.
They wanted for nothing before my reign ended. Look on them now.
I believe you wanted to help, but we were doomed the moment you came here.
The Emperor will want to make an example of your resistance. He'll likely claim we conspired with you as an excuse to crack down harder.
Why are you being targeted by Arcann?
We have a camp. I can offer you protection.
You've suffered enough out here. We can help.
Let us help you.
You've only got a handful of soldiers, and we don't have the resources to support this many refugees.
Is that even possible?
Take a look around. Anything would be better than what they've got now.
They'll only draw attention to us. You're risking the mission and our lives.
That's going too far.
My mission. My squad. My decision.
Come with us.
I'm giving you a say because we have history. A lot of it. But make no mistake, this is my command. Sir.
Okay. We'll trust you.
Kanner. We're on our way back. We've got civvies in tow. A lot of them. Be on the lookout.
Hope you're up for some trailblazing. We'll need to clear a path for a group this large. Let's go.
It's clear if you run. Now! Help is waiting.
Open up! You've got to move! There are others waiting to take you to safety.
You can't stay here! The Skytroopers are burning everything. Run!
Get away while you can! Your people are waiting!
Because we doubt.
Tell them the reason.
I asked for proof of how our Immortal Emperor could ever die.
I searched the Old Ways for guidance.
I wondered why we continue to seek revenge on so many outlanders for the actions of one.
I sought justice for those condemned to exile.
We all had questions and the new Emperor does not suffer them. You may have given him an excuse to silence us for good.
